name: Post Terms Order – per Post based
author: Nsp Code

sections.description:
This plugin allows Taxonomy Terms sort per Post based using a Drag and Drop Sortable JavaScript capability. It include a clean interface which makes the plugin easy and intuitive to use.

Usage

Nothing complicated, eveyrone should be able to use this code:
* Install the plugin through the Install Plugins interface or by uploading the post-terms-order folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
* Activate the Post Terms Order plugin.
* A new menu item page will be created within Settings > Post Terms Order, this is the place where sorts can be created.

Limitation

The plugin is limited to 20 objects. For unlimited usage check the Advanced Post Terms Order

Advanced Version

There is an advanced version of the plugin with improved functionality and more features. For more details check the Advanced Post Terms Order

This plugin is developed by Nsp-Code

Localization

Available in English, Romanian.
Want to contribute with a translation to your language? Please check at https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/post-terms-order
http://www.nsp-code.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload post-terms-order folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin from Admin > Plugins menu.
  3. Once activated you should check with Settings > Post Terms Order
  4. Use the Settings > Post Terms Order interface to customised the terms order as need.
sections.faq:
Any questions please use the forum or e-mail at electronice_delphi@yahoo.com

I have no PHP knowledge at all, i will still be able to use this plugin?

Absolutely you can! Unlike many other plugins, you don’t have to do any code changes to your theme for making this code ready for use.

What kind of post types does this plugin support?

All existing custom post types are supported
